segments.text: The kitchen layout draws me in with its angled view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, towel bunched around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, water overflowing in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming under her foot; what a careless mistake.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden through the window looks inviting, with its fence and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs the stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand in the cookie jar, the other clutching a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's unstable, legs splayed out awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, reaching up expectantly for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Lower cabinets get splashed by the runaway water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes on the counter seem forgotten in the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene blends routine chores with hidden perils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how unaware everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR
